channel.title: Run.Bat message
channel.description:
Hello, i have a question, When i compile my source it works fine, but when i click my run.bat it shows this..
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java108)
And whenever someone trys to log in, it just shows a black screen, can anyone help or tell me what this means? and how to fix it? i have no idea :3

item.title: Run.Bat message
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Or just make a check of the file. Cycle each line, if there are too many tabs, System.out.println() the line number. Easy Peezy.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.Bat message
item.dc:creator: @Infernal_Pure Infernal Pure
item.description:
@Infernal_Pure wrote:

yea but idk where i put the 17 not 16 xD . thats why i need someome to teamview lol

Read full topic

item.title: Run.Bat message
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“ChaosPkers, post:4, topic:342216”][quote author=Infernal Pure link=topic=438628.msg3223501#msg3223501 date=1275359292]
can anyone please teamview me to help? D:
[/quote]google how to fix

“java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException”[/quote]

The error is caused by too many tabs in the item.cfg file. It should be 16, not 17.

Read full topic

item.title: Run.Bat message
item.dc:creator: @JaydenD12 JaydenD12
item.description:
@JaydenD12 wrote:

“java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException” was thrown to indicate that an array has been accessed with an illegal index.

Read full topic
